connectionToPtLawrence: Granddaughter of George Nelson and Diana Culver. Was flower girl (age 4) at aunt Lou's wedding at Alderbrook in 1902.

family.parents: Otis Henry "O.H." Culver and Mabel Gertrude Smith
family.spouses: George August Hipkoe (b. January 27, 1888 in Alden, Rice, Kansas)
family.siblings: Evelyn Louise Culver, Mabel Florian Culver, Mary Luella Culver, Carroll Nelson Culver
